comments.body: I think in the future we could change this to also use the same Downloader type added by this PR, but with a wrapper around the handler which does the retry at the old "/swagger.json" endpoint and also adds the authinfo and a timeout, but it seemed out of scope for this PR
Just added the comment above before reading this. Another PR looks good to me.
Is there a test that this fallback works?
Tests for fallback in downloader and discovery_client added
